original_title: Chop-chopped First Lady + Chop-Chopped First Daughter
overview: A tongue-in-cheek poke at our own culture and recent history. The First Lady is none other than Imelda Marcos, the First Daughter none other than Kris Aquino. Both womenâ€™s lives and antics juxtaposed with gory evocations of the highly publicized chop-chop lady murders that were exploited by those 90s slasher films Aquino herself starred in.
title: Chop-chopped First Lady + Chop-Chopped First Daughter
